SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
B.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectBoardList() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD B
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON(B.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON(B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO)
C.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
C.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
B.BOARD_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE = 1
) A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, 10

SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectBoardDetail() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ no }

SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectReplyList() */ A.REPLY_NO , A.REF_BOARD_NO , A.REPLY_BODY , A.REPLY_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.CREATED_DATE , B.MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME FROM TBL_REPLY A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.REPLY_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.REF_BOARD_NO = #{ refBoardNo } ORDER BY A.REPLY_NO

SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectAllThumbnailList() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , B.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE' ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#incrementBoardCount() */ TBL_BOARD SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{ no }
